alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 11:18AM EST until January 28 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County. Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County. .Half inch to an inch of rain has fallen on a deep snowpack leading to runoff and melting. Rivers are expected to rise causing minor flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sycamore Creek at Holt. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river, in the Lansing Municipal Golf Course and sections of East Mt. Hope Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 8.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.5 feet on 05/13/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. Next issuance statement expected by Saturday afternoon at 130 PM EST.
